Class Settings

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    public class Settings
extends java.util.Properties
    A class of loading HDAPI configuration settings.
    See Also:

      • getLocalFilesDirectory

        public static java.lang.String getLocalFilesDirectory()
        Getter of local files directory setting: local.files.directory .
        Returns:
        the directory where locally stored files are expected to be found (tress, specs JSON files) null is returned if local.files.directory is not configured.

      • isUseProxy

        public static boolean isUseProxy()
        Getter of use proxy setting: proxy.enabled .
        Returns:
        Return true if use_proxy is not 0. Return false if setting value is 0.
